name: Avoid accessing multiple times the same SAP Table or View in an SAP Program (UPDATE)
description:
This metric retrieves the ABAP programs making more than a defined number of accesses to the same database table or view. If a program defines classes, then methods belonging to the first level of classes are taken into account.
The number of accesses is a parameter of the rule.
output:
Associated to each ABAP Program with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The ABAP Table/View accessed multiple times
rationale: For maintainability and performance aspect, avoid making access multiple times to the same database table or view in the same programs.
remediation: Try to use a common component to make access to the database table or view. The different parts of the program that need to make access to the same database table or view will have to call this component.
